alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 9:36PM CDT until May 07 at 5:31AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. .Water levels are expected to rise back into Flood Stage Sunday and crest in Moderate Stage early next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY, MAY 07... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Saturday, May 07. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. City begins to mobilize. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 5.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning to a crest of 13.0 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
